"A.D.2028/4/19/13:30": "Ha... Hahaha! Hitsugi, you're so lively, Hitsugi. Way different from that doll-like state from before!"
"Ahhhh, this is so much fun, fun! Being with Hitsugi is always the most fun!"
"Hey, Hitsugi... I think you know, but there's something creepy about this girl."
"She's always talked like that."
"Choose your friends wisely, I guess."
"That's none of your business."
"But, you know... Even though she's strange, Kohri isn't that kind of girl."
"Hehe, ahahahahahahahahaha! It's so much fun! To be playing with Hitsugi, so much fun! Haha!"
"And that way she laughs... That's when Kohri would-"
"ESC-A Darker! There were still some left!"
"Kohri! Look out!"
"Hitsugi!"
"Hitsugi? Hitsugi... protected me?"
"But Hitsugi, you're supposed to be manipulated... Why...?"
"Because we're friends, of course!"
"Fri... end... That's right, I'm Hitsugi's friend and will always be by her... side..."
"There's no reason to think about it anymore. Open your heart, close your eyes."
"Mr. Ophiel..."
"Don't push yourself, Kohri Washinomiya. If we lose you, Mother will be sad."
"And... no one would be able to save your friend."
"You're..."
"I haven't consciously met you since Japan. Although, I've already allowed myself to examine the details of your body, very thoroughly."

"I am Ophiel Herbert.
Mother Cluster, Apostle of Water."

"So you're the one...
What have you done to Kohri?"
"You seem to misunderstand. Myself and Mother are simply supporting her goals."
"Her goal is to get you back, and return to that daily life you had before, with you."
"To that end, I'm forcing her to avoid thinking about unimportant things."
"That's what manipulation is!"
"Tch! He's fast at running away, the bastard!"
"...Kohri."
